summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingBYOMA Milky Moisture Cleanser is ultra-soothing and gently conditions and cleanses dry, sensitive skin for a fresh, glowing complexion.
details: DetailsBenefitsDeeply hydrating daily cleanser for sensitive and dry skinEffortlessly dissolves daily buildup including SPF, oil and makeupDermatologist tested & approved skincareAlcohol & fragrance-freeRecyclable bottlesClinically proven to provide all day hydrationClincally proven to brighten skin after a single useClinically proven to protect and maintain skin barrierNational Eczema Association ApprovedFeaturesThis cleanser combines a host of hydrating heroes, including Oat Extract and Panthenol to ease inflammation and nourish skin for hydrated, bouncy results and a stronger skin barrier.Key IngredientsTri-Ceramide Complex supports skin barrier health - Oat Extract and Panthenol ease inflammation and hydrateItem 2620413How To UseMassage into dry skin in slow, circular motions. Add water to emulsify and rinse thoroughly. Use AM + PM as your second step cleanse. Follow with your preferred Byoma serums + moisturizer.Precautions: Eye irritation.IngredientsAqua, Glycerin, Decyl Glucoside, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Diisostearyl Malate, Arachidyl Alcohol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Panthenol, Glucose, Glyceryl Stearate, Behenyl Alcohol, Avena Sativa (Oat) Meal Extract, Dipropylene Glycol, Arachidyl Glucoside, Ceramide NP, Cholesterol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Tocopherol, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Germ Extract, Xanthan Gum, Hydroxyacetophenone, Phytosphingosine, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Caprylyl Glycol, Citric Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Disodium EDTA, Stearic Acid, Oleic Acid, Maltodextrin, Cetyl Alcohol, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Astaxanthin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Butylene Glycol, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract, Lactic Acid, Cyanocobalamin, Sodium Citrate, Caprylhydroxamic Acid.
how_to_use: Massage into dry skin in slow, circular motions. Add water to emulsify and rinse thoroughly. Use AM + PM as your second step cleanse. Follow with your preferred Byoma serums + moisturizer.Precautions: Eye irritation.

reviews.headline: definitely will buy again
reviews.comments: I have come across so many cleansers that stripped my skin, and made my skin feel so much more dry than before I used it. But not this one. This brand and their products have single-handedly saved my skin. I have been using this cleanser and the byoma balancing mist, and every blemish on my face is gone within three days of me using their products! i will definitely be re-purchasing, and I would definitely recommend this to anyone that has acne prone skin!

reviews.headline: amazing product!!!!!!
reviews.comments: i have super acne prone/sensitive skin and this is truly the only cleanser that has really cleared my acne ever! it feels nice and cool on the skin and very easy to wash off. very inexpensive compared to other brands as well!

reviews.headline: good quality for the price
reviews.comments: as a professional esthetician I'm always trying new otc products and wanted to try this one, loved the texture and how gentle is for dry and sensitive skin type. good to use after a microneedle or skin resurfacing treatment !

reviews.headline: Healed my skin
reviews.comments: I have sensitive, acne-prone skin and this cleanser is strong enough to keep my acne away but gentle enough were it doesnt strip my skin barrier. I love it so much!!

reviews.headline: I love it!
reviews.comments: I've been using byoma moisturizer and eye cream and they both worked great for me so i wanted to give there cleanser a try and im loving it soo far, it doesn't emulsify and turn into a lather easily so after rubbing for a bit it start to lather up but other than that it has been cleaning my skin pretty good.

reviews.headline: Fantastic Hydration!!!
reviews.comments: I tried several cleansers that claimed to be gentle hydrating, but my skin was still dry. I was thrilled when I tried Byoma's Milky Moisture Cleanser and it actually left my skin moisturized, hydrated, and soft without irritation! Love this product!

reviews.headline: Love it by definitely a little drying!
reviews.comments: I used a different hydrating cleanser but it doesn't dry my skin, but this one does, although not so much i need to double hydrate after!

reviews.headline: Okay
reviews.comments: Honestly there's nothing special to it. My skin didn't feel extraordinarily clean and I didn't notice any glow or less acne or help with spots. Just a pretty basic cleanser. Would be ideal for someone with combo/very sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: The perfect cleanser!
reviews.comments: I'm truly loving this amazing product.  My skin is dry and this milky cleanser it's perfectly gentle enough during and after washing. If you wanna remove a makeup, just for a light coverage.

reviews.headline: helped me a lot!
reviews.comments: my skin tone seems a lot more even than it was before i started using this! if you have dry skin, i definitely recommend this. my skin feels so soft after i wash it and the product doesn't leave a residue.

reviews.headline: Great!
reviews.comments:
I like this product a lot! I've been using it as my only cleanser for a couple months and it's been gentle enough that my skin doesnt feel tight or dey after washing. I've had no issue with it removing sunscreen and light face makeup but it will not remove eye makeup or full coverage foundations without double cleansing. I use this in the AM by itself and then in the PM as a second clease after the Byoma Milky Oil cleanser. There's no harsh scent either. 

I've already repurchased.

reviews.headline: The best affordable cleanser!
reviews.comments: Love this cleanser for my sensitive skin. Always leaves my face feeling moisturized!

reviews.headline: 10/10 for my dry skin
reviews.comments: So far it's been a dream. Definitely recommend to use with the mucin serum!

reviews.headline: Great cleanser
reviews.comments: This is one of my fave cleansers. It's gentle on my skin & removes all my makeup easily.

reviews.headline: Not as great as I hoped.....
reviews.comments: This is a decent first step in a double cleanse process. It did not remove my waterproof mascara however. I really had to work it and even then, it didn't work. My skin felt good though. A good one for non-makeup wearing folks.

reviews.headline: made my skin worse
reviews.comments: I have been looking for a gentle cleanser for my dry skin and as soon as i started using this I startes getting pimples. I dont know if i want to wait and use it longer to see if it goes away because i hate my skin like this!

reviews.headline: Really wanted to love it
reviews.comments: Been on the hunt for a milk cleanser as my skin no longer tolerates Cerave, Cetaphil, La Roche Posay, or Vanicream. Sadly still on the hunt. Didnt like how you have to use many pumps to get a decent lather, and it kind of smells like glue. My skin hasnt improved either :(

reviews.headline: Just Okay
reviews.comments: The product is very thin, I don't feel like it cleanses my skin and removes my makeup well, even after a double cleanse I have black around my eyes. It doesn't leave my skin feeling tight, so it's fine when I don't wear makeup.

reviews.headline: I love this!!!
reviews.comments: So this is an amazing cleanser and has to be my fav thing made by Byoma!!! My skin has never felt softer, only con though it definitely doesnt remove maleup good like it says i love pairing it with the Bubble magic melt its my absolute favorite combo!! My skincare routine contains: Bubble magic melt, Byoma milky moisture cleanser, Byoma hydrating serum, and Bubble slam dunk moisturizer. My skin is so soft, hydrated, feels clean, looks great, and hasnt brokeout in AWHILE i 100% recommend if you have dry skin but im sure it works on almost all skin types! ðŸ’—

reviews.headline: Would not buy again
reviews.comments: Did not remove all my makeup. I'll stick with Cerave Hydrating cleanser. Disappointed because I love their milky toner.

media.headline: Love it by definitely a little drying!
Milky oil face cleanser is good for dry skin
Love love love this. My skin thanks me.
Will buy over and over again
media.caption: Amazing cleanser

media.headline: PERFECT for my dry, sensitive skin!

faceoff_positive.comments: it's rare to come across a product that not only promises to cater to the needs of sensitive skin but also lives up to its claims. The BYOMA Milky Moisture Cleanser has been a delightful discovery for me, a product that not only respects the skin's natural barrier but enhances it, thanks to its innovative formulation. Here's my take on this gentle giant.This Milky Cleanser has earned a permanent spot in my skincare routine. It stands out not just for its ingredient integrity but for its performance and the peace of mind it offers to those of us with sensitive skin. It's a prime example of how skincare can be both gentle and effective, and a reminder that caring for the skin's barrier is the first step towards a healthy, glowing complexion. gifted by byoma
faceoff_positive.headline: Love Love Love it!!!

faceoff_negative.comments:
To start, it is on me for not fully reading the product description before purchasing this product lol. I love all things BYOMA so I kind of blindly bought this cleanser just because I trust and love this brand. Here are the pros: 
1. It removes makeup pretty well with just one wash
2. it is a great size bottle for the price 
3. It has not caused any adverse reactions for my sensitive, acne-prone, and redness-prone skin

Here are some cons I have noticed: 
1. This one is on me for sure, but I didn't realize it was a cleanser you have to apply to dry skin and then work in with water after. I wasn't necessarily looking for a product like this to be my everyday cleanser. 
2. Although it is a good-sized bottle, you have to use a good 5-6 pumps to get nearly enough product to actually cover your face since it is applied to dry skin first. 
3. I usually have to use a second cleanser after this one because it leaves my skin with an oily film. Maybe this is something good for the skin (IDK), but I don't personally love that because I already struggle with oily skin so I mainly use this as a first cleanse to remove makeup and then use something else as a double-cleanse. I can get by with just using this product at night since I'm sleeping and it doesn't matter if my skin looks a little extra oily lol but I definitely do not use this product alone in the mornings. 

I was hoping to use this as my everyday, morning and night cleanser because I am on the hunt for a new one. However, this definitely is more of a one-in-awhile thing for me, personally. I don't hate it because it does remove makeup well and is gentle on my sensitive skin. However, I'm not sure if I will be repurchasing since I kind of have to use a second cleanser after this and that defeats the purpose of why I bought it. If you have dry skin, this might be a great product for you! But since I do not have dry skin, it is not going to be my go-to cleanser. Again, most of this is on me so just be sure to fully read the product description and how to use before buying lol!
faceoff_negative.headline: Don't super love, don't super hate
